titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate certain provisions which presently require the rounding of automatic cost-of-living increases, so as to ensure the eligible individuals will receive the full amount of such increases.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the rounding-off of cost-of-living increases in OASDI benefits.
